text: The 1931 Southern Conference Men's Basketball Tournament took place from February 27–March 3, 1931, at Municipal Auditorium in Atlanta, Georgia. The Maryland Terrapins won their first Southern Conference title, led by head coach Burton Shipley.Southern Conference Tournament Results. p. 6-7.
